revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Cisco |model=Meraki MR32 |revision=-HW (LIC3YR) |asin=B00SU4M042 |fcc_date=12/09/2014 |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |manuf=Senao |availability=now |type=managed access point |fcc_id=UDX-60031010 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_poe=af |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM53016A1 |cpu1_cspeed=1 GHz |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=32 |fla1_brand= |fla1_model=NAND |ram1=128 |ram1_brand= |ram1_model=DDR2 |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM43520;BCM43520KMLG; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi2_chip1_model=BCM43520;BCM43520KMLG; |wi2_chip2_brand=Broadcom |wi2_chip2_model=BCM43428;BCM43428KMLG; |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=Bluetooth Chip;Broadcom;BCM20732;;1; ,,, 2.4GHz Power Amplifier IC;Skyworks (SiGe);SE2623L;;2; ,,, 5GHz Power Amplifier IC;Skyworks (SiGe);SE5003L;;2; |flags=Bluetooth |stock_boot=U-Boot |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|802.11ac Wireless Indoor Access Point}} :[https://meraki.cisco.com/products/wireless/mr32 Product page] :[http://meraki.cisco.com/lib/pdf/meraki_datasheet_MR32.pdf Datasheet]
Per the [https://fccid.io/document.php?id=2463550 FCC photos]: the ''Air Marshall'' radio is a BCM43428 (2T2R 802.11abgn).
PSU: '''PowerTron''' PA1015-2HU (100-240VAC ~50-60Hz, 0.4A -> 12VDC, 1.5A)
PoE: '''PowerDsine''' PD-9501G/AC (100-240VAC ~50-60Hz, 1.5A -> 55VDC, 1.35A)
*[https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?id=67543 ''Meraki MR32 Support'' on '''OpenWrt''' forums]
